Segment.name: LFH
Segment.comment: To uniquely identify the variable information required by government regulation covering the transportation of hazardous material shipments

Field.name: HazardousMaterialShipmentInformationQualifier
Field.comment: Qualifier indicating the type of information being passed so that a receiver may format a description of hazardous commodity movements that meets regulatory requirements

Field.name: HazardousMaterialShipmentInformation1
Field.comment: Specific information required by law for hazardous material shipments

Field.name: HazardousMaterialShipmentInformation2
Field.comment: Specific information required by law for hazardous material shipments

Field.name: HazardZoneCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the Department of Transportation assigned zone designating the Inhalation Toxicity Hazard Zone

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either LFH05 or LFH06 is present, then the other is required.
